# DataFrameMathOps { #mypackage.DataFrameMathOps }

```python
DataFrameMathOps()
```

Provides static methods for element-wise arithmetic operations on pandas DataFrames.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [add](#mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.add) | Element-wise addition of two pandas DataFrames. |
| [divide](#mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.divide) | Element-wise division of two pandas DataFrames. |
| [multiply](#mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.multiply) | Element-wise multiplication of two pandas DataFrames. |
| [subtract](#mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.subtract) | Element-wise subtraction of two pandas DataFrames. |

### add { #mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.add }

```python
DataFrameMathOps.add(df1, df2)
```

Element-wise addition of two pandas DataFrames.

Args:
    df1 (pd.DataFrame): The first DataFrame.
    df2 (pd.DataFrame): The second DataFrame.

Returns:
    pd.DataFrame: The result of adding df1 and df2 element-wise.

### divide { #mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.divide }

```python
DataFrameMathOps.divide(df1, df2)
```

Element-wise division of two pandas DataFrames.

Args:
    df1 (pd.DataFrame): The first DataFrame.
    df2 (pd.DataFrame): The second DataFrame.

Returns:
    pd.DataFrame: The result of dividing df1 by df2 element-wise.

### multiply { #mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.multiply }

```python
DataFrameMathOps.multiply(df1, df2)
```

Element-wise multiplication of two pandas DataFrames.

Args:
    df1 (pd.DataFrame): The first DataFrame.
    df2 (pd.DataFrame): The second DataFrame.

Returns:
    pd.DataFrame: The result of multiplying df1 and df2 element-wise.

### subtract { #mypackage.DataFrameMathOps.subtract }

```python
DataFrameMathOps.subtract(df1, df2)
```

Element-wise subtraction of two pandas DataFrames.

Args:
    df1 (pd.DataFrame): The first DataFrame.
    df2 (pd.DataFrame): The second DataFrame.

Returns:
    pd.DataFrame: The result of subtracting df2 from df1 element-wise.
